detectors.description: Variable PriviChain._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PriviChain.sol#39) is not in mixedCase

PriviChain.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PriviChain.sol#49-57) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 700000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PriviChain.sol#53)
detectors.markdown:
[PriviChain.constructor()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PriviChain.sol#L49-L57) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [_totalSupply = 700000000000000000](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PriviChain.sol#L53)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- PriviChain.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PriviChain.sol#59-61)
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PriviChain.sol#8)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PriviChain.sol#9)
	- PriviChain.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PriviChain.sol#63-65)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- PriviChain.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PriviChain.sol#67-69)
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PriviChain.sol#10)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PriviChain.sol#11)
	- PriviChain.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PriviChain.sol#77-82)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- PriviChain.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PriviChain.sol#71-75)
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PriviChain.sol#12)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PriviChain.sol#28)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PriviChain.sol#28-30)
